description: This file defines the LogEntry entity class for a Java backend application using JPA annotations. It models a log entry with fields such as id, associated log, user, content, category, tags, and creation timestamp, including database mapping details.

classes.name: LogEntry
classes.description: Entity class representing an individual log entry with metadata and relationships to Log and User entities.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the log entry.

methods.name: getLog
methods.description: Returns the associated Log object, if any.

methods.name: setLog
methods.description: Associates a Log object with this log entry.

methods.name: getUser
methods.description: Returns the User who created this log entry.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Sets the User for this log entry.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the textual content of the log entry.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content for the log entry.

methods.name: getCategory
methods.description: Returns the category label for the log entry.

methods.name: setCategory
methods.description: Sets the category label for the log entry.

methods.name: getTags
methods.description: Returns the tags associated with the log entry.

methods.name: setTags
methods.description: Sets the tags for the log entry.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the log entry was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp for the log entry.
